content:
Hi everyone,
I'm unsure I am on the right canal. Anyway, I'd like to contribute to cargo by solving https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/issues/6378 . I have started looking at the code and I'd like to discuss it further with cargo developers because the main road-blocker is the code architecture of cargo itself, where would it be appropriate to do so?
#cargo is the right channel, although some of the maintainers read #general too
Thanks, I was zuliped and thought posting there was limited to team members.
